title: Nexus Serif vs Mix
content:
Normally I wouldn't really consider using a "slab" serif for text but it seems to me that Nexus Mix is a very good one.

It's for a 30-some page guide, not sure what it'll be set in yet, but I suspect either 11 or 12.

Anyone ever used it (Mix) for text? I don't own it yet so I cannot try it and the serif out except for the specimens they provide on the 'net.

Thanks,

Pierre-Luc
author: Pierre-Luc Auclair

comments.content: It's a good looking typeface, but like a lot of postmodern slabs, it is so distinctive that it can interfere with readability... you see the typeface rather than the words... however, if you want a slab serif, it is one of the best

Have you printed the [FF Nexus Mix PDFs](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014060822/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_nexus_mix_ot_regular/), Pierre-Luc? I think it's quite readable at 10/12 or 12/14.
